snippet.title: When It Hits the Fan - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Offcial Gameplay Trailer for When It Hits the Fan, Coming to Steam and itch.io September 19th, 2017.

Steam:  http://store.steampowered.com/app/522900/When_It_Hits_the_Fan/

Developed by Trey Cockrell of Heartfelt Games LLC.

Download the demo at http://www.heartfeltgames.org/when-it-hits-the-fan

Follow on Twitter at: http://www.twitter.com/trueyomic or http://www.twitter.com/heartfeltgames
Facebook:  http://www.facebook.com/heartfeltgames
Tumblr:  http://trueyomic.tumblr.com

Main Developer and Programmer:  Trey Cockrell (@Trueyomic)
Artist:  Ryan "mulletdulla" Keable
Music / most SFX:  ryunocore
